p: Methods: All urgent ICU admission and palliative care consultation requests at an academic tertiary hospital from May, 2014 to May, 2015 were evaluated. Patients were analyzed in four different groups: 1) ICU request without palliative care consultation (ICUnoPAL), 2) ICU request and palliative care consultation (ICUandPAL), comprising those patients with 3) palliative care consultation before ICU admission request (PALbefICU) and those with 4) palliative care consultation after ICU admission request (PALaftICU).
